Class PlayerModes

java.lang.Object
  PlayerModes
Direct Known Subclasses:
MultiPlayer, SinglePlayer
public abstract class PlayerModes
extends java.lang.Object

A class that represents common things between Game Modes. Create the frame and game panel for the game.

Author:
floren

Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

PlayerModes

public PlayerModes(int mode,
                   int difficulty)
Constructor of the class. Create the frame and gamePanel for the game. Create the maze and set the mode for the game.

Parameters:
mode - the mode of the single game (ADVENTURE_MODE/COIN_MODE).
difficulty - the difficulty level of the maze.

movePlayer

public void movePlayer(Player player,
                       Direction direction,
                       javax.swing.JLabel[][] labels,
                       GameMode maze)
Move the player in the system. Update the player coordinates and repaint. If the player has finished, send a congratulation message.

Parameters:
player - the player that needs to be moved.
direction - the direction of movement of the player.
labels - the labels associated with the player.
maze - the maze associated with the player.
